item.title: How Long It Takes to Learn Russian
item.description: 1100 hours? 1100 hours, says Denis Fedorov, who refers to science. Languages in 5 categories of difficulty. 1100 hours to master Russian, which falls into category 4. That’s about 1 year of studying 3 hours a day or 3 years at 1 hour a day.
